resources.string: Vehicle sitting square and not leaning to one side.
Wheels in good condition, secure and wheelnuts tight.
Tyres undamaged with correct inflation and tread depth.
Good visibility for driver through all windows and mirrors.
Engine oil, water/coolant, windscreen washer reservoir and fuel levels
Fuel cap in place and exhaust secure with no excessive noise or smoke.
Tax, insurance and NCT/MOT discs present and valid.
